briefTitle: Effects of Colesevelam HCl, Rosiglitazone, Sitagliptin on Control of Blood Glucose and Lipids in Type 2 Diabetes Patients Whose Blood Glucose Isn't Completely Controlled With Metformin

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* HbA1C 7.0 % to 10.0% on metformin monotherapy; may be withdrawn from other (non-metformin) drugs if HbA1C is 6.5% to 9.5 % at screening.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Subjects currently treated with a thiazolidinedione are excluded.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percentage of Change in Glycosylated Hemoglobin (HbA1c) From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 16 Endpoint Least Squares Mean
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in HbA1c from Week 0(baseline)to Week 16 endpoint least squares mean with 95% confidence intervals, change = week 16 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percentage of Change in HbA1c From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: change in HbA1c from Week 0(baseline) to week 8 mean and standard deviation change = week 8 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percentage of Change in HbA1c From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 16 Endpoint
outcomeMeasures.description: Change in HbA1c from Week 0(baseline) to Week 16 endpoint mean with standard deviation change = week 16 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Fasting Plasma Glucose (FPG) From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 8 Least Squares Mean
outcomeMeasures.description: change in FPG from Week 0(baseline) to week 8 least squares mean and 95% confidence interval change = week 8 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in FPG From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 16 Least Squares Mean
outcomeMeasures.description: change in FPG from Week 0(baseline) to week 16 least squares mean and 95% confidence interval change = week 16 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in FPG From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: mean change in FPG from Week 0(baseline) to Week 8 with standard deviation change = week 8 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in FPG From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 16
outcomeMeasures.description: change in FPG from Week 0(baseline) to week 16 mean and standard deviation change = week 16 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Fasting Insulin From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 8 Least Squares Mean
outcomeMeasures.description: change in fasting insulin from Week 0(baseline) to week 8 least squares mean and 95% confidence interval change = week 8 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Fasting Insulin From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 16 Least Squares Mean
outcomeMeasures.description: change in fasting insulin from Week 0(baseline) to week 16 least squares mean and 95% confidence interval change = week 16 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Fasting Insulin From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 8
outcomeMeasures.description: mean change in fasting insulin from Week 0(baseline) to week 8 with standard deviation change = week 8 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Fasting Insulin From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 16
outcomeMeasures.description: mean change in fasting insulin from Week 0(baseline) to week 16 with standard deviation change = week 16 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Post-prandial Glucose From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 16 Least Squares Mean
outcomeMeasures.description: change in post-prandial glucose from Week 0(baseline) to week 16 least squares mean with 95% confidence intervals change = week 16 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Post-prandial Glucose From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 16
outcomeMeasures.description: mean change in post-prandial glucose from Week 0(baseline) to week 16 with standard deviation change = week 16 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in Post-prandial Insulin From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 16
outcomeMeasures.description: mean change in post-prandial insulin from Week 0(baseline) to week 16 with standard deviation change = week 16 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Low-Density Lipoprotein-C(LDL-C) From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 16 Least Squares Mean
outcomeMeasures.description: change in LDL-C from Week 0(baseline) to week 16 least squares mean with 95% confidence intervals change = week 16 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Change in LDL-C From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 16
outcomeMeasures.description: mean change in LDL-C from Week 0(baseline) to week 16 with standard deviation change = week 16 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percentage of Change in LDL-C Levels From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 16
outcomeMeasures.description: mean percent change in LDL-C levels from Week 0(baseline) to Week 16 mean with standard deviation change = week 16 - week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Mean Percentage of Change in LDL-C Levels From Week 0(Baseline) to Week 16 (Least Squares Mean)
outcomeMeasures.description: percent change in LDL-C levels from Week 0(baseline) to Week 16 (least squares mean with 95% confidence interval)
